title: 주차장의 빌런, 가로막기 대장
story:
"주차장의 빌런, 가로막기 대장"
피곤한 몸을 이끌고 퇴근한 G씨. 아파트 주차장은 이미 만석이라 이중 주차를 할 수밖에 없었습니다. 다음 날 아침, 출근을 위해 차를 빼려는데 앞을 가로막은 차가 중립(N) 기어가 아닌 사이드 브레이크를 꽉 채워놓은 상태입니다.

디테일: 전화를 걸었더니 5번 만에 잠이 덜 깬 목소리로 받습니다. "아... 금방 내려갈게요." 하지만 '금방'은 15분이 넘게 걸렸고, 내려온 차주는 사과 한마디 없이 하품을 하며 차에 올라타 유유히 사라집니다.

분노 포인트: 지각 위기에 처한 내 사정은 안중에도 없는 그 여유로운 하품과, 마치 내가 자기 잠을 깨운 게 잘못이라는 듯한 귀찮은 표정.
prompts: G's Arrival at the Parking Lot, Wide shot of the parking lot, showing G getting out of the car, looking tired.. characters: G. background: Evening atmosphere, dim lights in the parking lot, faint sounds of cars in the distance.. dialogues: Narration: 피곤한 몸을 이끌고 퇴근한 G씨.. surreal, dreamlike, fantastical, ethereal, otherworldly, cinematic anime illustration, detailed lineart, soft shading, dramatic lighting

Blocked by Another Car, Close-up shot of G's frustrated face as he sees the car blocking his way.. characters: G. background: Tense atmosphere, sounds of G's sighs and the engine idling.. dialogues: Narration: 아파트 주차장은 이미 만석이라 이중 주차를 할 수밖에 없었습니다.. surreal, dreamlike, fantastical, ethereal, otherworldly, cinematic anime illustration, detailed lineart, soft shading, dramatic lighting

Making the Call, Medium shot of G on the phone, looking impatient.. characters: G, Other Driver. background: Quiet atmosphere, sound of G's voice and the faint ringing of the phone.. dialogues: G: 여보세요? 차 좀 빼주세요.; Other Driver: 아... 금방 내려갈게요.. surreal, dreamlike, fantastical, ethereal, otherworldly, cinematic anime illustration, detailed lineart, soft shading, dramatic lighting

The Driver Finally Arrives, Wide shot of the parking lot as the other driver arrives, yawning.. characters: G, Other Driver. background: Frustrating atmosphere, sound of the other driver yawning and starting the car.. dialogues: Narration: 하지만 '금방'은 15분이 넘게 걸렸고.; Other Driver: 하품을 하며 차에 올라타 유유히 사라집니다.. surreal, dreamlike, fantastical, ethereal, otherworldly, cinematic anime illustration, detailed lineart, soft shading, dramatic lighting

G's Frustration, Close-up of G's face showing anger and disbelief.. characters: G. background: Tense atmosphere, sounds of G's heavy breathing and the distant sound of cars.. dialogues: Narration: 지각 위기에 처한 내 사정은 안중에도 없는 그 여유로운 하품과.. surreal, dreamlike, fantastical, ethereal, otherworldly, cinematic anime illustration, detailed lineart, soft shading, dramatic lighting

cuts.cut_name: G's Arrival at the Parking Lot
cuts.composition: Wide shot of the parking lot, showing G getting out of the car, looking tired.
cuts.background: Evening atmosphere, dim lights in the parking lot, faint sounds of cars in the distance.
actions: G gets out of the car
G looks around the parking lot

cuts.composition: Close-up shot of G's frustrated face as he sees the car blocking his way.

dialogues.speaker: Narration
dialogues.text: 아파트 주차장은 이미 만석이라 이중 주차를 할 수밖에 없었습니다.

cuts.background: Tense atmosphere, sounds of G's sighs and the engine idling.
actions: G stares at the blocking car
G shakes his head in disbelief

cuts.composition: Medium shot of G on the phone, looking impatient.
cuts.background: Quiet atmosphere, sound of G's voice and the faint ringing of the phone.

cuts.composition: Wide shot of the parking lot as the other driver arrives, yawning.

dialogues.speaker: Other Driver
dialogues.text: 하품을 하며 차에 올라타 유유히 사라집니다.

cuts.background: Frustrating atmosphere, sound of the other driver yawning and starting the car.
actions: Other Driver gets into the car and drives away

cuts.composition: Close-up of G's face showing anger and disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Narration
dialogues.text: 지각 위기에 처한 내 사정은 안중에도 없는 그 여유로운 하품과.

cuts.background: Tense atmosphere, sounds of G's heavy breathing and the distant sound of cars.
actions: G looks at the departing car with anger
